data.text:
Most eyes will be on the NFL game between the Kansas City Chiefs and San Francisco 49ers as they battle it out to win the Super Bowl in a rematch of their 2019 clash, which Patrick Mahomes' side won, but eyes will quickly turn to the half-time show too. This year, it will be performed by Usher and a question on many lips is how manty children does he have?

What is Ushers real name?

Usher Terry Raymond IV was born on October 14, 1978, in Dallas and raised in Chattanooga, Tennessee. He began singing in his church choir when he was 6 years old.

Usher Raymond IV, widely known as Usher, is an American singer and songwriter who rose to fame in the late 1990s with his smooth R&B vocals and electrifying performances.

Usher released his breakthrough album, My Way (1997), which then led to creating hits like You Make Me Wanna... and Nice & Slow. He continued his success with albums like 8701 (2001), Confessions (2004), and Looking 4 Myself (2012), earning numerous awards, including Grammys and Billboard Music Awards.

He has four children named Usher V, nicknamed Cinco who is 16, Naviyd Ely (15), Sovereign Bo (three years old) and Sire Castrello (two years old). Usher has often credited his children for being inspirations behind his music and in 2020 said that he values the concept of family highly when talking to James Corden on The Late Late Show.

"You should never abandon that responsibility," Usher told Essence in 2008. "Which is to be there, reading with your child, being supportive of your child's growth.

"That is communicating. That is making the choice to put your child before your own vanity."

How many times has Usher been married?

Usher has been married twice. His first marriage was to stylist Tameka Foster, whom he wed on August 3, 2007, in a civil ceremony in Atlanta, followed by a larger wedding ceremony on September 1, 2007, at the Chateau Elan Winery & Resort outside Atlanta.

Their marriage ended in divorce, which was legally finalized on November 4, 2009. The pair had his eldest two children, Usher V and Naviyd, together.

His second marriage was to his long-time girlfriend and manager, Grace Miguel. They quietly married in September 2015 while vacationing in Cuba. However, their marriage ended in separation, with Usher filing for divorce on December 28, 2018. The pair did not have any children.
